select FAQ_NO ,SJ ,REG_DE ,CON ,HITCNT ,UPD_DE ,DEL_YN ,REG_MB_NO from FAQ where DEL_YN = 'n'

and CON LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') /* content */
and ( SJ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') /* subject + content */ or CON LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%'))
